data.title: Many visits since summer 2015
data.text: I first tried this place when visiting the Best Western Norwalk Inn across the street. I honestly wish they had a location where I live because the menu option is large and very reasonably priced. The food always taste great no matter if it's the steak and eggs breakfast or the sourdough bacon cheeseburger to the chili cheese fries. What I love is how there are many Mexican food selections on the menu along side American food. The best of both worlds! The staff are always friendly. I usually get my food to go but there is plenty seating for dining in. They also allow phone orders. I eat here every visit to LA - Norwalk.

data.title: Best carne asada plate i've ever had. Home maid ranch made the salad excellent. Muey buena comida!
data.text: I have had beaucoup de cuisine Espagnol in metropolitan Los Angeles, & i just ate the best yet. Sam's is fresh, filling, flavorful, & the atmosphere is festive. Very reasonable & big portions. I want more soon. Gracias, es muy buena comida!

data.title: Great service
data.text: We walked across the street from our hotel to eat here.  They have a large menu.  We came as a large group with everyone ordering separately.  A couple mistakes but they gladly fixed them.  Would return again.
